Prints module.

py_common.sp_base.m_print.print_line_separator_with_title(title, separator, line_length)[source]¶

Print configurable separation line with some title inside.

Raises:

  • Exception – “Separator length not equal to 1” when spearator is longer than one sign

  • Exception – “Title length greater than line_length” when text to be added is longer than separator it self

Returns:

Error codes where 0 if sucedded

Return type:

int
